nodes.text: Landonis Balthazar Calrissian's motif was written by John Williams for the 1980 film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. The leitmotif represents Landonis Balthazar Calrissian, and is played in the tracks "The City in the Clouds," "Lando's Palace," and "Betrayal At Bespin" in the film's soundtrack. The musical figure also forms a part of the track and music piece "Yoda's Theme."
The motif is reprised in Star Wars Rebels, scored by Kevin Kiner. The motif is played several times with variation in the episodes "Idiot's Array" and "The Siege of Lothal."
